body_html:
Sorry, it's my fault with VM settings) Works well if u have 8 or more GB VM RAM
Could use smth like this to create nice docker machine:
docker-machine create —driver virtualbox —virtualbox-memory 8192 —virtualbox-cpu-count 4 MachineName

body:
Sorry, it's my fault with VM settings) Works well if u have 8 or more GB VM RAM
Could use smth like this to create nice docker machine: 
`docker-machine create —driver virtualbox —virtualbox-memory 8192 —virtualbox-cpu-count 4 MachineName`
